<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Drain Soul Cage](/Feats.aspx?ID=3514) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 50</row>

**Archetype** [Lich](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=179)

**Prerequisites**
[Lich Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3513)

</column>

---

You make your [_soul cage_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1545) into your bonded item, allowing you to harness its abundant magical energy. Once per day, when you use Drain Bonded Item, you can choose any spell in your spellbook that you can cast, even if you haven't prepared or cast it that day. Your _soul cage_ doesn't need to be on your person for you to use Drain Bonded Item. If your _soul cage_ is broken or destroyed, you can't use Drain Soul Cage. Even if you can Drain Bonded Item more than once per day, for instance if you are a universalist wizard, you can still only choose a spell you haven't prepared and cast once per day.
name: Drain Soul Cage
